characters: Multiple pedestrians, including children and adults, are observed in the images. In the first sequence, a child suddenly appears from the right side of the image, darting into the road. In the second sequence, a woman with a child on her back suddenly emerges from the left side of the image. In the third sequence, a man in a yellow jacket suddenly runs into the road from the left side of the image. In the fourth sequence, a child suddenly runs into the road from the right side of the image.
summary: The video sequences show multiple instances of 'ghost probing' behavior where pedestrians, including children and adults, suddenly emerge from behind obstructions and enter the road, creating immediate collision risks. These obstructions include parked vehicles and roadside structures, which block the driver's view until the last moment.
actions: In the first sequence, a child suddenly runs into the road from the right side, emerging from behind a parked vehicle. In the second sequence, a woman with a child on her back suddenly appears from the left side, emerging from behind a parked vehicle. In the third sequence, a man in a yellow jacket runs into the road from the left side, emerging from behind a building. In the fourth sequence, a child runs into the road from the right side, emerging from behind a roadside structure.
key_objects: Parked vehicles on both sides of the road, roadside structures, and pedestrians.
